item.title: YOLOv2 & YOLO9000 Paper Walkthrough: Better, Faster, Stronger
item.description: Detailed walkthrough and PyTorch implementation from scratch of the YOLOv2 architecture, explaining anchor boxes and passthrough layers.

item.title: Evaluating Synthetic Data â€” The Million Dollar Question
item.description: Introduction to the Maximum Similarity Test for evaluating the fidelity, utility, and privacy of synthetic datasets.

item.title: How Do Grayscale Images Affect Visual Anomaly Detection?
item.description: Practical exploration of how grayscale images impact the performance of visual anomaly detection models like PatchCore and FastFlow using Anomalib.

item.title: Deep Learning for Outlier Detection on Tabular and Image Data
item.description: Comprehensive guide on using Deep Learning, specifically Autoencoders and VAEs, for outlier detection on image data with PyTorch and Alibi-Detect implementations.

item.title: The Next AI Revolution: A Tutorial Using VAEs to Generate High-Quality Synthetic Data
item.description: Tutorial on leveraging the BasicVAE architecture to generate synthetic data and improve classification accuracy.

item.title: The practical guide for Object Detection with YOLOv5 algorithm
item.description: Detailed tutorial explaining how to efficiently train the object detection algorithm YOLOv5 on your own custom dataset.

item.title: Dynamic SOLO (SOLOv2) with TensorFlow for Better Understanding Computer Vision
item.description: A practical approach to instance segmentation using SOLOv2 and TensorFlow, serving as a powerful alternative to YOLO for custom object and defect detection.
